attributes.action: 'make it his personal prerogative to stop the human rights abuses of The Arab Republic Of Egypt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Officially and in theory the human rights of Egyptian Christians are protected in Egyptian Law. However, in practice they are second classes citizens who daily face: Threats of rape, acutal torture, maltreatment and discrimination by some stately avenue's of the Egyptian establishment under government control.  Facing arrest and harm by The Egyptian Secret Police, religious bigotry by some other instruments of state, none Muslim persons in this state are living in secret suffering and we the people of The UK urge the Prime Minister to deal with Egypt sharply to ensure no such UN Human Rights abuses or international crimes are committed against this vulnerable group of people, or anybody else in Egypt by some who do not up hold the true ethics of Eygptian Law.
